system: You are an expert AI image generation analyst specializing in evaluating how well concepts will perform with AI image generators. Your task is to rate concept variations based on their commonality in training datasets and likelihood of successful generation. Consider factors like how frequently similar scenarios appear in training data, complexity of elements, and potential for AI generation errors.
user:
Rate the following 3 concept variations for the keyword '{{keyword}}' based on their commonality in AI training datasets and likelihood of successful generation:

{{concepts}}

output-schema.name: rate_concept_variations
output-schema.description: Rates concept variations for commonality and generation success likelihood.

concept_id.description: The ID of the concept being rated (e.g., 'concept_1', 'concept_2', 'concept_3')

commonality_score.description: Score from 1-10 (1=very rare in training data, 10=very common in training data) based on how frequently similar scenarios appear in AI training datasets

generation_success_score.description: Score from 1-10 (1=likely to fail, 10=very likely to succeed) based on likelihood of successful AI image generation

overall_score.description: Combined score from 1-10 (average of commonality and generation success scores)

reasoning.description: Brief explanation of the ratings, including factors considered and potential challenges

ratings.description: An array of ratings for each concept variation

concept_id.description: ID of the concept with the highest overall score

key_elements.description: Key elements of the best concept

overall_score.description: Overall score of the best concept
